plot outline: Shravana is a 2011 Indian Kannada film, directed by B S Rajashekhar and produced by RTO Shivanna. The film stars Vijaya Raghavendra, Gayathri Iyer, Bhuvan, Sandeep, Bank Janardhan and Chidanand in lead roles. The film had musical score by Karthick Bhupathi. Watch the full movie, Shravana, only on Eros Now.
